name: A Cat
description:
A short videogame made entirely and exclusively by me, excluding the music (duh). 

I wanted to honour the good old classic Mega Man creating a game with a retro aestethic and simple gameplay, so I worked on this for almost a month and this is what we got.

Hope you enjoy it!

Other projects: https://www.artstation.com/s_carlos_25

Twitter: https://twitter.com/S_Carlos_25

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Shoot - J

Jump - K

??? - L
